title: Group Disbanded
body: I keep trying to play and when the match is preparing, I get a notification that pops up saying, "Group Disbanded." Then I'm kicked from the match loading. Anyone else having this issue, cause I'm afraid I'm gonna get my account locked or something from "leaving" the games.. Even though I'm not leaving, it's kicking me..

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is having a hard time staying connected to the PvP.net service. Since these issues are often caused by network settings that prevent a good connection to the servers, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
